title: Looking to Climb
body:
Hello guys, 

I'm a JG main (Elise, Udyr, Sejuani) pretty flex in my picks, also can play your standard sups to a decent level. Looking for a team/people to climb ranked with. Haven't had much luck queuing on my own, think it'd be much more fun if I had people to play with/improve my game with. 

I've got a good understanding of the role and am always looking to improve myself just hoping there are people out there who'd want to like get a group together and start climbing

replies.body: do you listen to shot calls haha.?
I'm willing to help you climb :)
